actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.
Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Packwood under the authority of the order of Mar 24, 83 without amendment. With written report No. 98-48.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 76.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A bill to enhance the transfer of technical information to industry, business, and the general public by amending the Act of September 9, 1950 (15 U.S.C. 1151 et seq.) to establish a Technical Information Clearinghouse Fund, and for other purposes.
short_title: Technical Information Clearinghouse Fund Act of 1983

summary.text: Technical Information Clearinghouse Fund Act of 1983 - Amends provisions relating to the dissemination of technical, scientific, and engineering information to establish in the Treasury the Technical Information Clearinghouse Fund. Requires the Secretary of Commerce to use the Fund as a revolving fund to carry out the activities necessary to make the results of technological research and development more readily available to industry and business. Lists the sources of the Fund's deposits. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Technical Information Clearinghouse Fund Act of 1983

A bill to enhance the transfer of technical information to industry, business, and the general public by amending the Act of September 9, 1950 (15 U.S.C. 1151 et seq.) to establish a Technical Information Clearinghouse Fund, and for other purposes.
